documents.title: 1920 Census - Allen B Falkman
documents.notes: The Falkman family, Herman, Mary, Bea and Allen are on lines 70 - 73.  Mary's father, Gerald Allen is on line 74.

documents.title: 1950 Census - Allen B Falkman
documents.notes: The Falkman family, Allen Sr, Helen, Allen Jr, Gerald, Richard and Robert are on lines 3 through 8.

documents.title: Illinois Draft Registrations 1940
documents.notes: This is the Illinois Draft Registrations from 1940 for Allen B Falkman Sr

documents.title: New Jersey Census 1930
documents.notes: Although difficult to see, the Alexander family, Frank Sr, Ida, Frank Jr, Violet and Helen are on lines 42 through 46.  Use the magnifier to get a better look.
